body.name: John Doe
body.message: Hi, do you have any tomatoes left?

body.name: Bob Williams
body.message: No, sorry John, I just swapped the last box.

body.name: Jane Smith
body.message: Hey Eva, do you have any bell peppers?

body.name: Eva Martinez
body.message: Yes, I have some fresh bell peppers available. How many do you need?

body.name: Alice Johnson
body.message: Hi Michael, I'm looking for sweetcorn. Do you have any?

body.name: Michael Lee
body.message: Certainly, Alice! I have some sweetcorn. How much do you need?

body.name: Bob Williams
body.message: Sara, I heard you're interested in broccoli. I have some fresh ones.

body.name: Sara Brown
body.message: That's great! I'd love to get some broccoli. When can we arrange the swap?

body.name: Eva Martinez
body.message: Daniel, I have some extra pears. Interested?

body.name: Daniel Chen
body.message: Sure, Eva! Pears sound great. Let's coordinate the swap.

body.name: Michael Lee
body.message: Olivia, I have sweetcorn available. Need any?

body.name: Olivia Kim
body.message: Absolutely! Sweetcorn is on my list. Let's arrange the swap.

body.name: Sara Brown
body.message: William, I heard you're interested in cauliflower. I have some fresh ones.

body.name: William Wilson
body.message: Fantastic! Cauliflower is exactly what I need. Let's make the swap happen.

body.name: John Doe
body.message: Daniel, do you have any carrots available?

body.name: Daniel Chen
body.message: Yes, John! I would love some carrots. Let's arrange the swap.

body.name: Olivia Kim
body.message: Jane, I'm interested in tomatoes. Do you have any left?

body.name: Jane Smith
body.message: Sorry, Olivia, I just ran out of tomatoes. Let me know if you need anything else.

body.name: Alice Johnson
body.message: William, I have fresh apples available. Interested?

body.name: William Wilson
body.message: Absolutely, Alice! Apples are perfect. Let's arrange the swap.

body.name: Alice Johnson
body.message: Great! I'll bring them to you soon.
